resource.name: Appointments/appointments
resource.description: Maintains a list of appointments organized by date and time. Appointments can be displayed daily, weekly, monthly or for the next 45 days.

attribute.description: [Optional] Indicates the name of a document where to store your appointments. Leave empty to use default storage.
attribute.name: calendarURL

method.description: Retrieves appointments for the selected date.
method.name: getAppointmentsByDate
